attributes.action: punishment publicly, who pee on streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people are either drunk or just do it for fun. Having number of CCTV cameras and partolling cars, its easy to get hold of these people and catch them in the act. They should be made to clean the street and their pee during afternoon hours in public. Also, install and increase the current public toilets on high streets, specially near pubs and night clubs. they may charge 20p for a single use. They are needed really for late hours, and early morning. Say 11pm - 7 am.
